machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative positioning
G1 E-1 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 Z1 E-1 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 Z2 ;Raise Z
G90 ;Absolute positioning
G12 P1 ;clean nozzle
G1 X5 Y300 ;Return to Start Point
M106 S0 ;Switch off part cooling fan
M104 S0 ;turn off temperature
M140 S0 ;turn off Heated Bed
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
M81 ;turn-off power

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G1 Z2 ;Raise Z
G28 X Y ;Home XY
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 E-1 F2400 ;Retract
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X315 Y70 F3000 ;clean nozzle
G1 X330 Y150 F5000
G1 X315 Y70
G1 E-1 F2400 ;Retract
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G28 Z ;home Z
G1 X300 Y150 Z5
G12 P1 ;Clean nozzle
G29 ;Measure the bed
M500 ;Store parameters
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up little to prevent scratching of Heat Bed
G1 X0.1 Y20 Z0.36 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 X0.1 Y200.0 Z0.36 F1500.0 E15 ;Draw the first line
G1 X0.4 Y200.0 Z0.36 F5000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X0.4 Y20 Z0.36 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw the second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
